summary: Adds new variations of the "Fiery Soul Trap" enchantment from the vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
INDEX:
1: Description (Spoiler-Free)
2: Description (With spoilers)
3: Installation
4: Compatibility
5: Credits
6: Permissions
----------------------------------------------------------------1----------------------------------------------------------------------
Description (Spoiler-Free)

No DLC version: adds 3 new soul trap enchantments to the game, as well as unique weapons for each scattered throughout the world. Also changes the Fiery Soul Trap enchantment.

Base enchantments:

Cryogenic Soul Trap: Target takes 8 points of frost damage to Health and Stamina. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

Fiery Soul Trap: Burns the target for 8 points. Targets on fire take extra damage. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

Magnetic Soul Trap: Target takes 8 points of shock damage, and half as much Magicka damage. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

Vampiric Soul Trap: Absorb 9 points of health. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

All DLC version: adds 2 new soul trap enchantments to the game, as well as a unique weapon for each of them scattered throughout both Skyrim and Solstheim.

Base Enchantments:

Chaotic Soul Trap: 50% chance for each element of fire, frost, and shock to do 7 points of damage. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

Holy Soul Trap: 9 points of sun damage. If target dies within 2 seconds, fills a soul gem.

This mod also changes what the enchanting slider does with these enchantments; while it used to change the soul trap duration, it now changes the damage magnitude.


----------------------------------------------------------------2----------------------------------------------------------------------
Description (With spoilers)

Weapon locations/ids:

Stahlrim Dagger Of Chaotic Souls: found in a chest in Bristleback Cave (in Solstheim). Id: 8B005908

Steel Battleaxe Of Fiery Souls: found in Ironbind Barrow (like usual). Id: 00040002

Orcish Bow Of Frozen Souls: found in a chest in Frostmere Crypt. Id: 8C0213D8

Silver Greatsword Of Holy Souls: found in a chest in Dimhollow Crypt. Id: 8B00590A

Dwarven Mace Of Shocked Souls: found in a chest in Avanchnzel. Id: 8C0012CD

Elven Warhammer Of Vampiric Souls: found on a table in Pinemoon Cave. Id: 8C0012CE


----------------------------------------------------------------3----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation
Simply install with the NMM. If you want the DLC version, you must install the non-DLC version as well.


----------------------------------------------------------------4----------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatability
Should be compatible with most mods, but for best results, put it before any mod you are unsure of in your load order. This mod also works even if you install it on a save on which you have already disenchanted the Steel Battleaxe of Fiery Souls.

Acquisitive Soul Gem users: make sure Acquisitive Soul Gems is placed AFTER Better Soul Trap in your load order.

TTYM users: you may want to put Better Soul Trap after TTYM, unless you don't mind a double message.

IMPORTANT: If you find any mods that ARE incompatible with BST (or any problems/bugs at all) please tell me about them so I can try to fix it.
